prompt: Photorealistic, wide shot of a well-lit, modern art gallery. An appraiser, a woman in her late 40s with glasses and a professional blazer, carefully examines a large abstract painting on canvas with a magnifying glass. The owner, a man in his 60s, stands respectfully beside her, awaiting her assessment. Soft, diffused natural light floods the gallery through large windows. Focus on the details of the brushstrokes and canvas texture. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-get-art-appraised-image-1.png

prompt: Ultra-realistic, close-up image of an appraiser's hands carefully measuring a sculpture with calipers. The sculpture is a small, antique bronze figure on a velvet-covered table. The background is blurred, showing a dimly lit room filled with antique furniture and art objects. Focus on the texture of the bronze and the precision of the measurement. Shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-get-art-appraised-image-2.png

prompt: Dramatic, wide-angle shot of a grand estate's interior. An art appraiser, a man in his 50s with a distinguished appearance, stands in a vast, ornate living room, surrounded by priceless antiques and paintings. He is holding a tablet, consulting art market data. The scene is bathed in warm, golden light from a large chandelier. Focus on the scale and opulence of the setting. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-get-art-appraised-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic image of a modern office space. An appraiser is on a video call with the owner of a painting, showing the painting on the wall behind them. The appraiser is pointing to the screen, discussing the artwork with the owner of the painting, who is visible in a smaller window on the screen. The office is clean and well-organized, with art books and reference materials on shelves in the background. The lighting is bright and professional. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-get-art-appraised-image-4.png

prompt: Ultra detailed, photorealistic macro shot of an appraiser examining a painting's signature with a magnifying glass. The signature is faded and difficult to read. The canvas texture and paint cracking are highly detailed. The lighting is focused and intense, highlighting the subtle details of the signature. Shallow depth of field, with the signature as the main focal point. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-get-art-appraised-image-5.png
